name: Amastermind
overview: This is a shareware mastermind-type game in which the player must work out a hidden combination of colors based on clues given by the game. The shareware game was free to distribute, but users would need to pay in order to gain access to all features, updates and to remove nags. The game was later published in Now That's What I Call Games in 1993 for CD enabled Amiga computers by Multi Media Machine Ltd.
